sentence.Network_en: "I have", he remarked with pardonable pride, "done what I set out to do."
sentence.Network_cn: “我已经，”他以情有可原的骄傲语气说，“完成了我要做的。”

entry.def: You describe someone's action or attitude as pardonable if you think it is wrong but you understand why they did that action or have that attitude.

example.ex: 'I have', he remarked with pardonable pride, 'done what I set out to do.'
example.tran: “我已经，”他以情有可原的骄傲语气说，“完成了我要做的。”
